name: Tiny Turbo Squid
description:
How far can you make it through these deadly underwater tunnels? Do you have the chops to go all the way? Join the tiny titular turbo-squid as he twists and turns through tricky tunnels and torturous traps. 

  • Three fixed levels! 
  • Daily challenge mode!
  • Share your scores! Amaze your friends! Brag!
  • Exclamation point!

CW: Motion sickness: this game is entirely about swoopy 3D flying-through-tunnels with nothing in the way of a fixed lanscape to orient on.
